title: Stompin' Steakhouse Chili with Blue Cheese Toast

instructions.1: Using half of 1 Safeway SELECT Artisan Sour Dough Baguette (8 oz.), cut diagonally to make 18 slices, about 1/4 inch thick and 3 inches long.
instructions.2: In a bowl, mash together 3/4 cup Safeway SELECT Primo Taglio Imported Danish Blue Cheese, 3 tablespoons Lucerne Sweet Cream Butter, 1 tablespoon minced parsley, and 3/4 teaspoon black pepper until blended and easy to spread.
instructions.3: Spread mixture equally on one side of each bread slice; lay buttered side up and slightly apart on an 11- by 17-inch baking sheet. Bake in a 350 degrees F oven until bread is crisp, about 15 minutes.
instructions.4: Top slices with additional blue cheese spread, if desired.

questions.question: Is oven from Step 3 still available in Step 4?
What is the last time interval specified in Step 3?
Can we use (Step 1) and top (Step 4) at the same time?
